long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark Lock Extension

Description:

Keep your bookmarks safe and organized with the Bookmark Lock Extension! This user-friendly tool allows you to secure your bookmarks with a customizable PIN, ensuring your private links are protected from prying eyes.

Features:
Secure Locking: Protect your bookmarks with a simple PIN setup. Only authorized users can access your bookmark collection.
Drag-and-Drop Functionality: Easily organize your bookmarks into folders with intuitive drag-and-drop features.
Delete Options: Manage your bookmarks effortlessly with delete buttons for both folders and individual bookmarks.
Modern Design: Enjoy a sleek and modern interface with stylish text and backgrounds for an enhanced user experience.
Bookmark Links: Access your favorite sites quickly with clickable bookmark links styled for easy readability.
Whether you want to keep your bookmarks private or just organize them neatly, the Bookmark Lock Extension is the perfect solution. Download now to start securing your online favorites!

Version 1.1:
- Persistent unlock feature: stays unlocked until you choose to lock.
- Drag-and-drop bookmarks into folders.
- Warnings before data deletion after 5 incorrect PIN attempts.
- General UI and performance improvements.

Version 1.2:
- Added persistent unlock feature: stays unlocked until manually locked.
